divs: Sighting DetailsWent out to south porch of house to relieve myself after me and my partner got done watching a tv program. I looked up to the sky to enjoy the bright clear starlight night and as I changed my point of view from straight-up to NW view immediatly noticed a large bright star object moving from NW to SE, thinking it was possibly a satelite I called for my partner to witness what I saw, when she got from the couch to the south porch the object stopped, dropped straight down and behind a tree line. She was scared and went back inside, I was curious and walked to the south portion of the property and saw the same object moving slowly down then suddenly, in a flash, move back to the NW position, almost exactly where I first saw it. From there it seemed to change colors and move left, right and up, down for a short while before it eventualy dropped down out of sight.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ladysmith
There were no other sightings in Ladysmith on or around May 14th 2010
Summary: VERY bright object moving first from NW to SE then changed flight path(down) and QUICKLY back to NW position where it
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
